title: Class Holes!
description: A college freshman is caught off guard by a surprise arrival. Now she must navigate campus life with her father and his sidekick Mr. Nubbins in tow.
creator: Brian Griffin
altHero: James Woods drops his suitcases and is surprised to be in his daughter’s dorm room
alt1: Woods wears a backpack and walks into a classrom
alt2: Woods tears up a test in a lecture hall
alt3: Woods sneaks a peek next to him at his daughter’s test
alt4: Woods, his daughter, and the monkey Mr. Nubbins dancing in the dorm
